# iosxr_call_home (Resource)

This resource can manage the Call Home configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_call_home" "example" {
  service_active = true
  mail_servers = [
    {
      mail_server_name = "smtp.example.com"
      priority         = 1
    }
  ]
  sender_from                = "router@example.com"
  sender_reply_to            = "admin@example.com"
  contact_email              = "admin@example.com"
  phone_number               = "+14085551234"
  street_address             = "170 West Tasman Drive, San Jose, CA 95134"
  customer_id                = "CUST12345"
  contract_id                = "CONTRACT67890"
  site_id                    = "SITE001"
  rate_limit                 = 3
  data_privacy_level_high    = true
  http_proxy_name            = "proxy.example.com"
  http_proxy_port            = 8080
  source_interface           = "Loopback0"
  syslog_throttling          = true
  vrf                        = "OOB"
  aaa_authorization          = true
  aaa_authorization_username = "callhome"
  profiles = [
    {
      profile_name = "cisco-sl"
      active       = true
      destination_addresses = [
        {
          address_type        = "http"
          destination_address = "https://cisco-license.customer.com/Transportgateway/services/DeviceRequestHandler"
        }
      ]
      destination_message_size_limit             = 100000
      destination_msg_format_long                = true
      destination_transport_method_email_disable = true
      destination_transport_method_http          = true
      reporting_smart_call_home_data             = true
      reporting_smart_licensing_data             = true
      anonymous_reporting_only                   = true
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `aaa_authorization` (Boolean) Activate aaa authorization
- `aaa_authorization_username` (String) Username for authorization, default is 'callhome'
- `contact_email` (String) System Contact's email address
- `contact_smart_licensing` (Boolean) System Contact is Smart-Licensing
- `contract_id` (String) Contract identification for Cisco Smart Call Home
- `customer_id` (String) Customer identification for Cisco Smart Call Home
- `data_privacy_hostname` (Boolean) Level hostname
- `data_privacy_level_high` (Boolean) Level high
- `data_privacy_level_normal` (Boolean) Level normal
- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `http_proxy_name` (String) Specify proxy server for http request
- `http_proxy_port` (Number) proxy server port number
  - Range: `1`-`65535`
- `mail_servers` (Attributes List) Configure call-home mail_server (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--mail_servers))
- `phone_number` (String) Phone number of the contact person
- `profiles` (Attributes List) Enter call-home profile configuration mode (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--profiles))
- `rate_limit` (Number) Configure call-home event trigger rate-limit threshold
  - Range: `1`-`5`
- `sender_from` (String) Call home msg's from email address
- `sender_reply_to` (String) Call home msg's reply-to email address
- `service_active` (Boolean) Enable Call-home service
- `site_id` (String) Site identification for Cisco Smart Call Home
- `source_interface` (String) Source interface name to send call-home messages
- `street_address` (String) Street address for RMA part shipments
- `syslog_throttling` (Boolean) Enable or disable call-home syslog message throttling
- `vrf` (String) VPN Routing/Forwarding instance name

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--mail_servers"></a>
### Nested Schema for `mail_servers`

Required:

- `mail_server_name` (String) Configure call-home mail_server
- `priority` (Number) Mail server priority order
  - Range: `1`-`100`


<a id="nestedatt--profiles"></a>
### Nested Schema for `profiles`

Required:

- `profile_name` (String) Enter call-home profile configuration mode

Optional:

- `active` (Boolean) Activate the current profile
- `anonymous_reporting_only` (Boolean) Enable call-home anonymous reporting only
- `destination_addresses` (Attributes List) To add destination address to this profile (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--profiles--destination_addresses))
- `destination_message_size_limit` (Number) To specify message size limit for this profile
  - Range: `50`-`3145728`
- `destination_msg_format_long` (Boolean) Send long text format message
- `destination_msg_format_short` (Boolean) Send short text format message
- `destination_transport_method_email` (Boolean) Enable email as transport method
- `destination_transport_method_email_disable` (Boolean) Disable
- `destination_transport_method_http` (Boolean) Enable http as transport method
- `destination_transport_method_http_disable` (Boolean) Disable
- `reporting_smart_call_home_data` (Boolean) Report Smart Call Home data
- `reporting_smart_call_home_data_disable` (Boolean) Disable
- `reporting_smart_licensing_data` (Boolean) Report Smart Licensing data
- `reporting_smart_licensing_data_disable` (Boolean) Disable

<a id="nestedatt--profiles--destination_addresses"></a>
### Nested Schema for `profiles.destination_addresses`

Required:

- `address_type` (String) To add destination address to this profile
  - Choices: `email`, `http`
- `destination_address` (String) Destination address (1-200) characters

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_call_home.example ""
```
